name: GymNOW
description: A full stack project produced while working at Quantworks inc. I wrote large pieces of the frontend cross platform app, as well as the restful backend api and database schema. It gives the user access to a network of athletic facilities that offer short term passes for the equipment, classes, and amenities that they offer.

name: TRU Delivery
description: A crossplatform delivery application for TRU Deli's bike delivery service. I built this app to interact with an already in place API to replace an outdated system. It allows customers to place to-go orders, in house orders, and delivery orders for custom sandwhiches and salads.

name: Malware Map
description: This is an experiment in full stack development. It includes a front end for visualization of geolocated malware origins, a back end to provide malware information, unit and integration tests, and Travis CI and Heroku integration.

name: Calcuweightor
description: An Ionic/Angular app for quickly calculating total weight when you have mixed standard weights in the gym.

name: Pulse Messenger
description: An experiment in design, this messenger concept app was created with NW.js and Angular. It is a full functioning front end.

name: Stop The Outbreak
description: A game for an exhibit in the Morehead Planetarium, it is a simulation style game intended to educate public about the difficulty of squelching Malaria outbreaks.

name: My Website
description: An angular based portfolio website to display my work to anyone interested enough to look at it.
